ygData.subject: Re: i haven't been stunned lately.....
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I know I just got stunned 3 times in the same period of invuln today running from a train in unrest that was all blue, no greens.  So I don t think that
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I know I just got stunned 3 times in the same period of invuln today
running from a train in unrest that was all blue, no greens. So I don't
think that has much to do with it. And I'd say at this point if it's not
been fixed by Verant, I'm personally not holding my breath to see it happen.

Lohre Soulsaver
Bristlebane

----- Original Message -----
From: Kevin Dailey <kevin_dailey@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 26, 1999 8:26 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] i haven't been stunned lately.....


> From: Kevin Dailey <kevin_dailey@...>
>
> The threads about divine aura reminded me to let you all know...i've
> used DA at least twice a night in Najena for the past week, and even
> though I've been running from skelly/ogre guard/magician/earth
> elemental/mist elemental choo choo trains, I haven't been stunned once
> while DA was active. Interesting.
>
> Is this MAYBE because the mobs who can stun are usually green? Most of
> the skellys in the early stages of Najena are green, though I'm not high
> enough level for them to ignore (lvl 17). But I believe that I've been
> stunned while DA has not been acitve....hmm....i'll have to do some more
> training (heh heh) and see what the deal is. Maybe Verant secretly
> patched that little bug. Errr...chuckle....guffaw.....HAHAHAHAHA!!!!
> Yeah, right. Freaking Nerf kings.
>
> Saidinn
>
>
>
